text: @PressSec Sad Herman Cain died on July30th, of COVID19.He freely attended Trump’s mask free/cramped space Tulsa Rally, June20th. Cain put Trump’s selfish needs above his own life.I’m perplexed,how Cain choose to shortened his own life,for the worst President ever...May He Rest In Peace. https://t.co/vDQ9bxXmh1
